data.message: Facebook why can't I go live and spread the Good News? WHY do I have to put a title saying "I don't own the rights to these songs" just so it can post! What are you scared it might catch? Because spreading light in a dark world isn't right? Is that right Facebook? I've also tried sending y'all a message privately, but no response. All I see is someone has read it.

replies.message: Hi Christina. If you have questions regarding copyright, please visit our copyright help center at: http://bit.ly/2vFS1wv. -Jessica
